data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 246 believers in Saint Ouen against self-centered spirituality. Open their eyes to the fields ripe for harvest around them.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Saint Ouen, Jersey
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Saint Ouen, Jersey to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 16 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Lord, use Google search to lead people in Saint Ouen, Jersey to the gospel today.
Holy Spirit, have mercy on the simple who turned from you in the state of Saint Ouen. Warn them again against their complacency.
data.verse: For the simple are killed by their turning away, and the complacency of fools destroys them;

data.prayer: Spirit, help every believer in Saint Ouen, Jersey be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks them for the reason for their hope.
data.verse: But in your hearts revere Christ as Lord. Always be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks you to give the reason for the hope that you have. But do this with gentleness and respect.

data.prayer: Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in Saint Ouen, Jersey and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, teach the disciples in the state of Saint Ouen to trust your Word, like a lamp, in the darkness around them.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp for my feet, a light on my path.
